channel.title: Npc drops (pi) rep++
channel.description:
Every time I add; [code]#Frost Dragon 10775:1 18830:1 18349:1 18353:1 18351:1 18355:1 18357:1[/code]
to Npcdrops.tsm - I get;
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/820/98473264.jpg/][IMG]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/3302/98473264.jpg[/img][/URL]
[b]YES IT'S TABBED![/b]
But when I change 10775 (the npc id) to 1077 I don't get the error anymore.... so that means unless I fix this problem then I can't make frost dragons drop. REP++

item.title: Npc drops (pi) rep++
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:

to Npcdrops.tsm - I get;

YES IT’S TABBED!

But when I change 10775 (the npc id) to 1077 I don’t get the error anymore… so that means unless I fix this problem then I can’t make frost dragons drop. REP++[/quote]

Was Guna say r u using tab?! But then I read… hmm. Try copying one that alrdy works and just changing ids. If that don’t work nulled npc?
